name: Charge! Men’s Private School: Japan, This is a Man!
name_original: Charge! Men’s Private School: Japan, This is a Man!
description:
Charge! Men’s Private School: Japan, This is a Man! is an arcade-fighting game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Charge! Men’s Private School: Japan, This is a Man! is available on PlayStation 3.
